title: UX/UI Product Designer
description: We are seeking a talented UX/UI Product Designer to create beautiful and functional user experiences. You will be involved in every stage of the design process, from user research and wireframing to high-fidelity prototyping and visual design. Your goal is to simplify complex workflows and create designs that are both aesthetically pleasing and easy to use. Proficiency in design tools like Figma or Adobe XD is required. You should have a strong portfolio demonstrating your ability to solve user problems through design, a deep understanding of design systems, and the ability to collaborate effectively with engineers to ensure design integrity during implementation.
